questions.q: Which is the largest continent by land area?
questions.e: Asia is the largest continent, covering approximately 44.58 million square kilometers.

questions.q: Which layer of the Earth's atmosphere is closest to the surface?
questions.e: The troposphere is the lowest layer of Earth's atmosphere where weather phenomena occur.

questions.q: Which desert is the largest in the world?
questions.e: The Sahara Desert in Africa is the largest hot desert, covering approximately 9 million square kilometers.
